meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>public building</kanji> where <kanji>writte</kanji>n things are all <kanji>diagram</kanji>ed out in a way that lets you find said written things? That sounds like a <vocabulary>library</vocabulary> to me!
readingMnemonic: The 書館 part should be readable by you, but it's the 図 that's troublesome with an alternate reading from the one you learned. Imagine yourself at the library. You check out every single book you can about the human <reading>toe</reading> (と). You have a giant stack of books on it, then you drop it... ironically on your toe.
